paintBackground

public void paintBackground(java.awt.Graphics g,
                            GanttChart chart)
Description copied from interface: RowRenderer
Renders the background of the Gantt chart. This is called prior to any paintRow invocations.

Specified by:
paintBackground in interface RowRenderer
Parameters:
g - the graphics object used for rendering
chart - the Gantt chart

paintRow

public void paintRow(java.awt.Graphics g,
                     GanttChart chart,
                     int row,
                     java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D bounds,
                     boolean isTable)
Description copied from interface: RowRenderer
Renders the background of a single row in the Gantt chart.

Specified by:
paintRow in interface RowRenderer
Parameters:
g - the graphics object used for rendering
chart - the Gantt chart
row - the index of the row
bounds - the rectangular bounds of the row
isTable - true if this is rendering the background in a GanttTable; false if rendering the background in a GanttChart
